meanings.sent1: In the past decade, technology has advanced rapidly.
meanings.sent2: My grandparents have been married for over six decades.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe a whole decade has passed since we graduated!
meanings.sent4: The decade seemed to fly by like a speeding train.
meanings.sent5: The roaring twenties was a decade of great change and innovation.

meanings.definition: A group or set of ten.
meanings.sent1: She bought a decade of pencils for the art class.
meanings.sent2: The store offered a discount for a decade of notebooks.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally ordered a decade of bananas instead of just ten!
meanings.sent4: The team won the championship with a decade of players working together.
meanings.sent5: The box contained a decade of colorful marbles for the game.
